entry.dcterms:description: 1. expectations regarding the country's economic situation and people's own financial expectations, 2. party preferences and political attitudes 3. opinions with regard to Hungary's NATO accession 4. attitudes about receiving refugees into the country 5. health, health-care gratuity, health care service
